message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm offering a special deal, where if you buy this product, I'll give you a second product for free. However, this second product is not guaranteed to be high-quality. If you buy this product, you'll get to choose whether to take the second product or not after you've opened it.
I'll buy the current product, but I'll only take the second product if it's high-quality. If it's low-quality, I'll pass on it.
